name: Predestination
description: Predestination is a turn-based sci-fi 4X game set in the distant past of our own galaxy. Ships from countless races are flung back in time by a powerful hostile race known as the Revenants, and must now work to rebuild their empires and somehow stop the Revenants in the past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1 Processor: 2+ GHz single-core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ dedicated graphics card (DX9 SM3.0 compliant) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Additional Notes: Some integrated laptop GPUs are not supported.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1 Processor: 3+ GHz dual-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ dedicated graphics card (DX9 SM3.0 compliant) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Additional Notes: Some integrated laptop GPUs are not yet supported.
